metadata.title: CVE-2019-0161 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Stack overflow in XHCI for EDK II may allow an unauthenticated user topotentially enable denial of service via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-0161` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.2+esm3
qemu-efi - 0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.2+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: edk2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.2+esm3').
